id: The Ultimate ChatGPT Guide + Prompt Pack + List of Tools
name: The Ultimate ChatGPT Guide + Prompt Pack + List of Tools
description: If you're not using AI in your daily workflow, you're falling behind...Discover how to harness the power of OpenAI's cutting-edge language model to streamline your personal and business life. From an introduction to ChatGPT, to engineering custom prompts, this guide covers all you need to know to start using ChatGPT with confidence. In this course, you will receive:✅ 1,000+ copy & paste prompts for digital marketers and entrepreneurs✅ Everything from email marketing to SEO, viral creatives,
features: A comprehensive introduction to ChatGPT, including how it works and its capabilities; A Notion database of proven ChatGPT templates to help you get started; In-depth training on how to use ChatGPT in your personal life to automate tasks and save time; Strategies for using ChatGPT in your business, including how to create custom prompts for specific use cases; An ever-evolving list of the best AI tools available on the Internet to help streamline workflows, boost productivity and make life easier; Practical hands-on exercises to reinforce your understanding and skills
